entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
